hoverMixin.text: hover mixin object proveds common API for mouse properties

clickable.text: flag which enables or disables mouse click event handling

hoverable.text: flag which enables or disables mouse hover event handling

activeHover.text: flag which becames 'true' on 'mouseover' event and becames 'false' on 'mouseout' event

activeHoverEnabled.text: flag which enables or disables 'mouseover' and 'mouseout' event handling
